name: corecontrol
tagline: A self-hosted control center for monitoring and managing servers
description: CoreControl is a modern, self-hosted control center for managing multiple servers and services. It supports monitoring, commands, and management from a sleek web dashboard, ideal for home labs and sysadmins.

features.title: Hardware Monitoring Dashboard
features.description: View real-time CPU, GPU, and system sensor data in a web interface

features.title: Fan and Power Control
features.description: Adjust fan speeds and power limits for supported hardware

features.title: GPU Performance Tuning
features.description: Configure GPU clocks and performance profiles

features.title: Web-Based Interface
features.description: Access system controls through a browser-based UI

features.title: Preset Profiles
features.description: Save and switch between predefined hardware configurations

features.title: Linux System Support
features.description: Operate hardware monitoring and control features on Linux systems
